value.title: Protect your identities with Azure AD Identity Protection
value.excerpt: Use the advanced detection and remediation of identity-based threats to protect your Azure Active Directory identities and applications from compromise.

value.title: Secure an ASP.NET Core web app with the Identity framework
value.excerpt: Add authentication and authorization to an ASP.NET Core web app using the Identity framework.

value.title: Explore the access management capabilities of Azure AD
value.excerpt: Explore the access management capabilities of Azure AD

value.title: Explore the authentication capabilities of Azure AD
value.excerpt: Explore the authentication capabilities of Azure AD

value.title: Azure AD Managed Service Identity | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Arturo Lucatero joins Donovan Brown to discuss Azure AD Managed Service Identity, which can be used to authenticate to any service that supports Azure AD authentication. For more information, see: What is Managed Service Identity (MSI) for Azure resources? (docs): https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/managed-service-identity/overview
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/bBi1bll2928" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: What can a managed identity be used for? | One Dev Question: Arturo Lucatero
value.excerpt: In the One Dev Question series, Arturo Lucatero, a Senior Program Manager working on managed identities for Azure resources, explains what you can do with a managed identity.   For more information, visit: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/managed-identities-azure-resources   Try Azure

value.title: Implement Windows Server IaaS VM Identity
value.excerpt: After completing this learning path, you’ll know how to implement identity in Azure. You’ll be able to extend an existing on-premises Active Directory identity service into Azure.

value.title: Intro to data classification and protection
value.excerpt: Learners should know and be able to describe data classification and data protection key concepts.

value.title: Intro to Microsoft data classification and data protection
value.excerpt: Learners will be able to describe Microsoft Information Protection and Azure Information Protection as well as how to use sensitivity labels to classify and protect data. Learners should also be able to describe technologies such as unified labeling scanners, Cloud App Security, service encryption and Office 365 Message Encryption.

value.title: Deploy and manage Azure IaaS Active Directory domain controllers in Azure
value.excerpt: Deploy and manage Azure IaaS active directory domain controllers in Azure

value.title: Enable secure access to apps for external users with Azure AD B2C
value.excerpt: Use Azure AD B2C as the full-featured identity system for your application, and ensure that users are required to sign in securely by using multi-factor authentication.

value.title: Enable secure external collaboration for your applications with Azure AD B2B
value.excerpt: Azure AD B2B collaboration lets you securely share your company's applications and services with guest users from any other organization, while maintaining control over your own corporate data.

value.title: Getting Started with Microsoft Identity
value.excerpt: Learn the basics of Microsoft identity including the different types of tokens, account types, and supported topologies.

value.title: Application types in Microsoft identity
value.excerpt: Learn how developers can leverage Microsoft identity in different types of applications.

value.title: Permissions and Consent Framework
value.excerpt: Learn the basics of Microsoft identity including the different types of tokens, account types, and supported topologies.

value.title: Secure custom APIs with Microsoft Identity
value.excerpt: Learn how to secure a web API with Microsoft identity and how to call it from another application.

value.title: Work with users, groups, and roles in custom apps and APIs
value.excerpt: In this module, you’ll learn how to use both Azure AD Groups and Application Roles to provide fine grained access control to an application.

value.title: Intro to data protection and privacy regulations
value.excerpt: Learn and understand the key terms and concepts of data protection, privacy regulation, and data processing. Describe, at a high level, the key Azure technologies that pertain to data protection and compliance.

value.title: Monitor and report on security events in Azure AD
value.excerpt: Keep tabs on security events in your Azure AD resources by using built-in reporting and monitoring capabilities. Respond to events as they happen, and address security risks before they become a problem.
